description: If you're a huge Toronto hockey fan, this is the app for you!  Toronto Hockey Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Toronto fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Toronto. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Toronto Hockey Fans today!    ** Brighthouse Labs and the Toronto Hockey Fans application are in no way associated with the NHL or the Toronto Maple Leafs. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
